title: Luis Nuñez
text:
Join me on a journey of continuous learning by exploring the skills necessary for data analysis: data cleaning, analysis, visualization, and effective communication.
I believe that data analytics and transformational public policy are essential for creating positive change in our communities and society at large. Through the use of data and evidence-based approaches, we can identify and address societal challenges more effectively and efficiently.
We are the path towards a better future for society as a whole.

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: about me
text: As an advocate for equitable and transformational public policy, I combine my research and data analysis skills with my personal experiences using economic security programs to assess policy proposals. As a research associate at the Center on Budget and Policy Priorities, I collaborate with analysts and researchers to advance federal legislation to help build a nation where everyone has the resources to thrive and share in the nation’s prosperity. I’m committed to advocating for data-focused policy solutions for an inclusive economy while enhancing fiscal responsibility. I seek continuous learning in data analytics and research within a transformational public policy framework.
